title: What Disney/Fox Merger Means For Us - Kinda Funny Screencast (Ep. 15)
description:
Get 15% off your first pair at http://meundies.com/morning

The boys discuss how Fox will affect Disney Plus, the latest Hobbs and Shaw trailer, and the state of superhero movies/shows.

Time Stamps - 
00:15:55 - Housekeeping
- News -
00:16:43 - 1. Biggest IMAX Screen Ever Set to Open in Germany Next Year
00:23:49 - 2. Kevin Smith Adds Chris Hemsworth to ‘Jay and Silent Bob Reboot’
00:27:09 - 3. Netflix Sets ‘The Crown’ Season 3 and ‘The Witcher’ for Mid and Late 2019
00:29:53 - 4. Disney Scraps Fox’s ‘Mouse Guard’ Two Weeks Before Production Begins
00:32:54 - 5. Disney CEO Bob Iger Says Fox Purchase Was All About Building Disney+ Content
00:35:58 - 6. A Bunch of Star Wars News
00:41:24 - 7. ‘Spider-Man: Far From Home’ is Getting an Earlier Release Date
00:46:33 - MeUndies
- Trailer Talk -
00:52:44 - Big Little Lies Season 2
00:57:25 - The Perfection
00:59:26 - The Boys
01:05:24 - Hobbs & Shaw
01:08:45 - Out now on Streaming Platforms
01:11:51 - This weeks Bronze
01:13:13 - Next week's Bronze
